about_the_game: An epic story of love, courage, and sacrifice, the tale of Inanna stretches across dozens of cultures and thousands of years. Follow the adventures of four heroes on their journeys of discovery and redemption. A linear visual novel voice-acted by Louise Porter, Richard Browning, Krissy Koellia, and others, The Epic of Inanna is a challenging and thought-provoking exploration of the meaning of life and morality. Available entirely for free with full translation into Arabic, Chinese, Czech, Dutch, English, French, German, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Thai, Turkish, Urdu, and Vietnamese.

content_descriptors.notes: This game has adult language, mild partial nudity, and several violent and frightening scenes that are described by the narrator but not shown visually.

detailed_description: An epic story of love, courage, and sacrifice, the tale of Inanna stretches across dozens of cultures and thousands of years. Follow the adventures of four heroes on their journeys of discovery and redemption. A linear visual novel voice-acted by Louise Porter, Richard Browning, Krissy Koellia, and others, The Epic of Inanna is a challenging and thought-provoking exploration of the meaning of life and morality. Available entirely for free with full translation into Arabic, Chinese, Czech, Dutch, English, French, German, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Thai, Turkish, Urdu, and Vietnamese.
legal_notice: Released under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International license.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 2.6+
  • Processor: x86 or x86-64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires glibc and x11 are installed

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: The Epic of Inanna

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 2000/7/8/10 and higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A linear visual novel voice-acted by Louise Porter, Richard Browning, Krissy Koellia, and others, The Epic of Inanna is a challenging and thought-provoking exploration of the meaning of life and morality.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
